# Number of Bytes

> Size (in bytes) of an 8-bit unsigned integer.

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```javascript
var UINT8_NUM_BYTES = require( '@stdlib/constants/math/uint8-num-bytes' );
```

#### UINT8_NUM_BYTES

Size (in bytes) of an 8-bit unsigned integer.

```javascript
var bool = ( UINT8_NUM_BYTES === 1 );
// returns true
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->

## Examples

<!-- TODO: better example -->

var UINT8_NUM_BYTES = require( '@stdlib/constants/math/uint8-num-bytes' );

console.log( UINT8_NUM_BYTES );
// => 1
